rooms.description: Spacious living area with modern decor and large windows for natural light.
Elegant dining space with modern design and a minimalist aesthetic.
Dedicated, quiet space for work with ergonomic furniture and ample storage.
Luxurious master bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort, with modern finishes and ample closet space.
Cozy guest bedroom designed for comfort and convenience, aligning with modern aesthetics.

openings.description: Modern front door ensuring seamless entry, compliant with Vastu for auspicious entrance.
Secondary access point aligning with natural ventilation and Vastu principles.
